remarks: Group division (or subtraction) operation.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpdiv.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpdiv.2 $e |- N = ( inv ` G ) $.
grpdiv.3 $e |- D = ( /g ` G ) $.
grpodivfval $p |- ( G e. GrpOp -> D = ( x e. X , y e. X |-> ( x G ( N ` y ) ) ) ) $.
$d G x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d X x y $.
